channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Newsletters
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Newsletters

item.title: CVE-2023-4797|2024-10-22T16:04:00.405Z -- unknown -- newsletters
item.description: The Newsletters WordPress plugin before 4.9.3 does not properly escape user-controlled parameters when they are appended to SQL queries and shell commands, which could enable an administrator to run arbitrary commands on the server.
